item.title: 俄罗斯今年在最致命的攻击中袭击了乌克兰东北城市苏米市 - CNN
item.description: 俄罗斯今年在最致命的攻击中袭击了乌克兰东北城市Sumy ＆nbsp; nbsp; href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiv0fvx3lxte1zqm9suwzkq25wnngyv09jnlfued vimtrycla1t3zwbtg1nlldwu52vy02ytmwx3vptudfbdnzqmfpawnohvnohv6yuo4c2itve1nrtzotvfpuq？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>俄罗斯弹道导弹罢工在苏米（Sumy）杀死了数十人，Zelensky说＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 超过20多名乌克兰人在棕榈周日罢工中被俄罗斯弹道杀死＆nbsp; nbsp; fox News <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirgFBVV95cUxNUEVFUHp2NzhwWVNERDVpSHRNWEk2RVJzbjRGWWdYYjNxYVdDaXdYcDdDZXdOR1hCNkRYQ210ckNSYlJVb0tFU 0fumwlstkxtzzfd2t0nfvpq2jtbxi5vg9qtk9pb0hjcxhucjq1emn6c05xqllrc0eyrnlma 1liwu9hnljbahhzxy1mmjdebtrycho4zlhsoxh1tddom2twnvzpywtfrwtfrwd3vxqq5zwc？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>乌克兰说，乌克兰说21次被俄罗斯弹道导弹罢工杀死 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmihwjbvv95cuxnbjllykt5b3rjac1ozwv6ngvpsdvppsdvqmevkqmevkq3dizdrqtt Y5bFhqYTFqV3pLZ2xfMlJhVndoemlSbXBDUWJtNWF1c1djU1V0SG1scW5LMDJIWU1WSGg3czhUTTFmV1NDR09XV0lTNVlfQV9UQkZ0 bwzfm2rub3lllupxa25ftjbdrwfmuhzivgjbdznevlkb05vyktsakhhr1rrtkf13a1zrdffqmmmtffqmmmtffqmmmtsrhros0jebvi3albvi3albnv2fjen JTMTZ5RG9MZXF2DFZLMWG4RWI1ZELALXG5QWZQSWNPODC2BK9VU01JTDRDRMDWNWNW5UQKXSRWNUYTUTSNHUVNHUVJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJJD2NYDVHVSQ？ target =“ _ blank”>有30多人丧生，在俄罗斯导弹袭击苏米市＆nbsp; nbsp; 多伦多星际
